title: Language Models as Continuous Self-Evolving Data Engineers
details: P Wang, M Wang, Z Ma, X Yang, S Feng, D Wang… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Large Language Models (LLMs) have demonstrated remarkable capabilities on various tasks, while the further evolvement is limited to the lack of high-quality training data. In addition, traditional training approaches rely too much on expert …
